name: Zambies!
description:
Zambies! is an action game where you kill zambies.

The game is unfinished so the goal is just to kill zombies and survive as long as you can. Pick up health packs and ammo to increase your lifespan.

Aim with the mouse. Use left click to fire the pistol. Use right click to launch a grenade. Press S while on top of the chainsaw to switch weapons. Press S when a zombie is on you to try to throw them off.

To turn on blood press V, type "girby", and press Enter.
